snippet: Starbucks plans a new chain of coffee shops for those who thought Starbucks coffee was too inexpensive. Four studies show that the Affordable Care Act is working “incredibly well.” And here is how to deal with a toxic employee.
abstract: Starbucks plans a new chain of coffee shops for those who thought Starbucks coffee was too inexpensive. Four studies show that the Affordable Care Act is working “incredibly well.” And here is how to deal with a toxic employee.

headline.main: Today in Small Business: The Best Jobs Numbers in Years?
